snippet: A 2011 bill required Texas law enforcement agencies to report the number of untested rape evidence kits on their shelves. The next question is how to pay to get all of that testing done.
lead_paragraph: A 2011 bill required Texas law enforcement agencies to report the number of untested rape evidence kits on their shelves. The next question is how to pay to get all of that testing done.

headline.seo: Hefty Cost to Testing Texas’ Huge Backlog of Rape Evidence Kits
headline.main: Testing State’s Huge Backlog of Rape Evidence Kits Comes With Hefty Price Tag
headline.print_headline: Testing State’s Huge Backlog of Rape Evidence Kits Comes With Hefty Price Tag
